Name: Elderflower Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wedge on rim &/or elderflower sprig when in season.
Review: Elderflower liqueur adds floral interest to the classic Daiquiri .
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Elderflower Daiquiri contains 160 calories
